The Legacy of Sauvage

Launched in 2018, Sauvage Eau De Parfum builds upon the revolutionary success of Sauvage EDT (2015). This new arrival to the Dior collection represents the brand's commitment to creating fragrances that embody both natural raw materials and innovative perfumery. The face of the fragrance, Johnny Depp, personifies its wild yet sophisticated character. ðŸŒ¿

The Dior Sauvage line has become one of the most recognizable luxury fragrances in modern perfumery, establishing itself as a cornerstone of contemporary masculine scents with its distinctive Dior DNA.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Sauvage Eau De Parfum last on skin?
Sauvage EDP offers exceptional longevity compared to most fragrances, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The Eau de Parfum concentration contains a higher percentage of fragrance oils than the EDT version, ensuring the scent projects strongly for the first 3-4 hours before settling into a close-to-skin scent that can last well into the evening. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and clothing fabrics. âœ¨
